title: The Author I Stole
description:
Description :
        Angela, who was born in a completely different world while retaining memories of her past life, embarks on her second life. She wishes to share the tales written by Andersen, her favorite fairy tale author in her past life. Angela establishes a publishing company and successfully publishes his fairy tales, thriving in her endeavors. However.... "This doesn't make sense!""What doesn't make sense?"To her surprise, Andersen also exists in this world! And not just any Andersen, but a callous and handsome one.Angela jumps at the opportunity to recruit a writer for the first time in her life. Despite leading a stable life as a knight hailing from an esteemed noble family, Andersen actually possesses a talent so brilliant like a jewel."Author, please sign a (lifetime) contract with me!"A romance fantasy even more enchanting than a fairy tale, .+
